column3: I heard you had to drive him home after two umbrella drinks
column4: I heard he's got a Prius,, because he's into being green
column5: My buddies said he saw y'all,, eating that sushi stuff
column6: Baby that don't sound like you,, that don't sound like love
column10: He can't even bait a hook
column11: He can't even skin a buck
column12: He don't know who Jack Daniels is
column13: He ain't ever drove a truck
column14: Knows how to throw out a line
column15: But not the kind in a field and stream book
column16: No darling I ain't even worried,, you'll come running back
column17: He can't even bait a hook
column20: Has he kissed you in a hay field as the summer rain falls down?
column21: Has he took you to meet his mama,, back in his home town?
column22: Does he drive the interstate,, or does he take them old back roads?
column23: Can he melt your heart with a country song,, every good old boy should know?
column29: It won't be that long,, until you start getting bored
column30: I'll be smiling on the river,, reeling in one more
column35: No baby I ain't even worried
column36: He can't even bait a hook
